Sentencas: Solid oxide electrolytes showing proton transport are extensively studied materials, which can be utilised in different types of highly efficient energy systems such as solid oxide fuel cells, solid oxide electrolysis cells, membrane converters and sensors.
Titulo: Thermal and Electrical Properties of Highly Dense Ceramic Materials Based on Co-doped LaYO3

Sentencas: Here we present the results of a study of the functional properties of LaYO3-based materials, which exhibit higher chemical stability than the more well known proton-conducting electrolytes, cerates and zirconates of alkaline earth elements.
Titulo: Thermal and Electrical Properties of Highly Dense Ceramic Materials Based on Co-doped LaYO3

Sentencas: The structural, ceramic, thermal and electrical properties of La0.9Sr0.1YO3-delta have been thoroughly studied depending on the partial Y substitution with some lanthanides (10 mol.% of Yb, Dy, Ho).
Titulo: Thermal and Electrical Properties of Highly Dense Ceramic Materials Based on Co-doped LaYO3

Sentencas: According to the experimental data, La0.9Sr0.1Y0.9Yb0.1O3-delta can be considered a promising alternative to the basic oxide because of its better transport properties and the fact that there are no detrimental changes in other functional characteristics.
Titulo: Thermal and Electrical Properties of Highly Dense Ceramic Materials Based on Co-doped LaYO3
